actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties

official_title: To amend title 1, United States Code, to eliminate any Federal policy on the definition of marriage.
short_title: State Regulation of Marriage Is Appropriate Act

summary.text: State Regulation of Marriage Is Appropriate Act - Amends the Defense of Marriage Act to repeal the statutory definition of "marriage" as meaning only a legal union between one man and one woman as husband and wife, and of "spouse" as referring only to a person of the opposite sex who is a husband or a wife.

titles.title: State Regulation of Marriage Is Appropriate Act
To amend title 1, United States Code, to eliminate any Federal policy on the definition of marriage.
